comments.raw_text:
From mdhughes as part of a Twitter conversation:
Another UI "feature" in Firefox that makes it too inconvenient for me to use is I can't type Cmd-1…9 to open bookmark bar items.

As seen in http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2301433/Screenshots/SafariBookmarks.png

Seems like a reasonable idea to me.

Later,
Blake.
comments.creator: bwinton@latte.ca

comments.raw_text:
As a side note, I belive Camino has this feature, so hopefully we can borrow their code.  ;)

https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=365270
